body:
That's normal for Powershell _even_ on Windows. Can you try this to see if it catches the actual error? Some of the catch block may need to be reformed (if it even loads the StreamReader object)

```
try
    {
    Invoke-RestMethod -Uri https://events.pagerduty.com/generic/2010-04-15/create_event.json -method Post -Body $body -ContentType "application/json"
    }
catch
    {
    $result = $_.Exception.Response.GetResponseStream()
    $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader($result)
    $reader.BaseStream.Position = 0
    $reader.DiscardBufferedData()
    $reader.ReadToEnd()
    }
```

Sure thing @nferrell. Results are below

```powershell
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0.16> try
>>     {
>>     Invoke-RestMethod -Uri https://events.pagerduty.com/generic/2010-04-15/create_event.json -method Post -Body $body -ContentType "application/json
"
>>     }
>> catch
>>     {
>>     $result = $_.Exception.Response.GetResponseStream()
>>     $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader($result)
>>     $reader.BaseStream.Position = 0
>>     $reader.DiscardBufferedData()
>>     $reader.ReadToEnd()
>>     }
You cannot call a method on a null-valued expression.
At line:7 char:5
+     $result = $_.Exception.Response.GetResponseStream()
+     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (:) [], RuntimeException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : InvokeMethodOnNull

Looks like a dupe of https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/2193 which has already been fixed and should be in alpha.17 coming soon

```powershell
PS /home/steve/repos/PowerShell> Invoke-RestMethod -Uri https://events.pagerduty.com/generic/2010-04-15/create_event.json -Method Post -Body $obdy -ContentType "application/json"            
Invoke-RestMethod : {"status":"unrecognized object","message":"Event object format is 
unrecognized","errors":["JSON parse error"]}
At line:1 char:1
+ Invoke-RestMethod -Uri https://events.pagerduty.com/generic/2010-04-1 ...
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (Method: POST, R...rShell/6.0.0
}:HttpRequestMessage) [Invoke-RestMethod], HttpResponseException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : WebCmdletWebResponseException,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Inv 
   okeRestMethodCommand

PS /home/steve/repos/PowerShell> $error[0].errordetails.message                                
{"status":"unrecognized object","message":"Event object format is unrecognized","errors":["JSON parse error"]}
```
